text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook .@realDonaldTrump   naw, you are freaking worse than Obama!!!  You misinformed our people about the election!!  You just want to cheat again to win the election again.  People have the right to vote at home to feel secured from covid19.   You are NOT above the law at all.
